name: Fukuaki TAKANO
body:
### About Me
Fukuaki TAKANO｜高野 福晃 is...  
a web engineer.   

### Work and Education
’09/04~’13/03　Dokkyo University -> Law  
’11/08~’11/09　CNE1 -> ESL  

’10/10~’11/08　Ryohin Keikaku -> MUJI sales staff  
’11/09~’12/03　Google -> Student Ambassador 1st.  
’11/12~’12/05　Gaiax -> Sales Intern  
’12/06~’12/07　iStyle -> Engineer Intern  
’12/10~’13/03　HDE -> Assistant Designer  
'13/04~      　iStyle -> Web Engineer
